mapper.select: select * from diner order by diner_code desc;
mapper.sql: select diner_code, file_code, diner_name, diner_address, diner_min_pay, diner_notice, diner_open_time, diner_close_time, diner_method_pay, diner_business_name, diner_company_num, diner_category, diner_delivery_fee, ST_X(diner_addr_point) as diner_addr_lng, ST_Y(diner_addr_point) as diner_addr_lat, diner_score_avg, diner_review_count from diner
mapper.select: where ST_Distance_Sphere(diner_addr_point, point(#{lng}, #{lat})) <10000 order by ST_Distance_Sphere(diner_addr_point, point(#{lng}, #{lat})) limit #{startNum}, 10
where ST_Distance_Sphere(diner_addr_point, point(#{lng}, #{lat})) <10000 order by diner_review_count desc limit #{startNum}, 10
where ST_Distance_Sphere(diner_addr_point, point(#{lng}, #{lat})) <10000 order by diner_score_avg desc limit #{startNum}, 10
where diner_category like concat('%', #{category}, '%') order by ST_Distance_Sphere(diner_addr_point, point(#{lng}, #{lat})) limit #{startNum}, 10
where diner_category like concat('%', #{category}, '%') and ST_Distance_Sphere(diner_addr_point, point(#{lng}, #{lat})) <10000 order by diner_review_count desc limit #{startNum}, 10
where diner_category like concat('%', #{category}, '%') and ST_Distance_Sphere(diner_addr_point, point(#{lng}, #{lat})) <10000 order by diner_score_avg desc limit #{startNum}, 10
mapper.insert: insert into diner(file_code, diner_name, diner_address, diner_min_pay, diner_notice, diner_open_time, diner_close_time, diner_method_pay, diner_business_name, diner_company_num, diner_category, diner_delivery_fee, diner_addr_point) value(#{file_code}, #{diner_name}, #{diner_address}, #{diner_min_pay}, #{diner_notice}, #{diner_open_time}, #{diner_close_time}, #{diner_method_pay}, #{diner_business_name}, #{diner_company_num}, #{diner_category}, #{diner_delivery_fee}, POINT(#{diner_addr_lng}, #{diner_addr_lat}))
mapper.select: select diner_code, file_code, diner_name, diner_address, diner_min_pay, diner_notice, diner_open_time, diner_close_time, diner_method_pay, diner_business_name, diner_company_num, diner_category, diner_review_count, diner_delivery_fee, ST_X(diner_addr_point) as diner_addr_lng, ST_Y(diner_addr_point) as diner_addr_lat from diner where diner_code = #{diner_code}
mapper.update: update diner set diner_score_avg = #{diner_score_avg} where diner_code = #{diner_code}
